name: Incel Simulator
description:
Oh boy, first simulador de venezuela and now this? Am I trying to offend people? Well, in short, no. Why did I create this? Friend dared me to. THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU GIVE EDGY 14 YEAR OLDS PROGRAMMING SOFTWARE.

WARNING! PLAYING THIS GAME FOR LONG PERIODS OF TIME COULD FUCK YOUR PC. IT IS VERY BADLY OPTIMIZED. FPS CAN DECREASE FROM 300 TO 3, SO MIGHT ASWELL GO TO POWERPOINT.

I do NOT condone violence against women, against anyone that is (maybe against incels is ok), but this is a game where you shoot women and get points and health for it.  Please god do not try to recreate anything in this game and please, do not kill me.
